channel.title: Comments on: Things I say and do while sleeping
channel.description: tales in the life of Madeline Ann Downey

item.title: By: Linda Arndt
item.dc:creator: Linda Arndt
item.description: Oh my God!!! I love Madeline's blog! We all knew she'd be bright, but really.... So glad your mom told me about this. She is too too adorable ! Congratulations to Mom & Dad and to Maddy, you really lucked out in the parents & grandparents department! Maybe we'll meet in person one day! Love to all, Linda
item.content:encoded: Oh my God!!! I love Madeline’s blog! We all knew she’d be bright, but really…. So glad your mom told me about this. She is too too adorable ! Congratulations to Mom & Dad and to Maddy, you really lucked out in the parents & grandparents department! Maybe we’ll meet in person one day! Love to all, Linda
